channel.title: Note on OmicX
channel.description: Recent content in Note on OmicX

item.title: Migrate to Hugo
item.description: The dependency of Node.js packages is over complicated and I have wasted lost of time on it. So I migrated the blog from Hexo to Hugo. Further more, the comment system moved to a self-hosted Isso-based server. A workthrough will be online later.
